casebody.data:
COURTNEY NC, LLC dba Oakwood Raleigh at Brier Creek
v.
Monette BALDWIN aka Nell Monette Baldwin No. 219P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 13, 2018. Monette Baldwin, for Baldwin, Monette. A Bartlett White, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Stephanie D'Atri, Attorney at Law, for Courtney NC, LLC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 8th of March 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of March 2018."

Beasley, and Morgan, J. recused
